name: Trash Game (Nwott, MaybeWill)
description:
Trash Game is an underwater survival game.

This isn't an ordinary survival game. In this game, you play as a one time use plastic bag trying to survive in the ocean full of sea creatures.

Key Features

Procedurally generated endless terrain

Five different enemies

Five items with different power ups to collect

Controls

WASD to move, left click to use items, F to interact

A game by Nwott and MaybeWill
